price: 本当に彼は、この上なく偉大な*アッラー*を信じておらず、
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: innahu kāna lā yu'minu bil-lahi al-ʿaẓīmi
